I am humbled to do so.

lender.occupational_info: We are students at Abilene Christian University taking a class in international development

lender.name: Alice
lender.loan_because: I'm a student and I keep getting told that my generation is 'the future'. Frankly, this worries me. The divide between those who can afford more things than they could ever actually use and those people who can barely scrape together enough to live is huge and it's sickening, I'm sick of adverts asking for money for faceless organisations that claim to be helping people. Loaning is great because I can actually see where it goes and see it do some good, also, like I said; I'm a student, so I don't have much money, but every time my $50 loan gets repaid, I will distribute it again to another person looking for a loan.

lender.name: Djamal
lender.loan_because: I like the idea of helping people help themselves.

lender.name: Emmanuel
lender.loan_because:

I also decided to give to your organization because I believe that you will use that money with wisdom and this will bring some joy to someone.
lender.occupational_info: I am studying in the International Apostolic Bible College in Kolding (Denmark).

lender.name: Gerardo
lender.loan_because: No one deserves to be truly poor.

lender.name: Chris
lender.loan_because: I want to pass on the hope and love I have received
